alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greenville and northwestern Spartanburg Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 859 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Greenville Downtown, or near Taylors, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Spartanburg, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Greer, Taylors, Boiling Springs SC, Travelers Rest, Duncan and Lyman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg
